ValidationRule.description: Field value cannot be NULL if Status is not Pending PAC Review - Transferring New to D/E
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( ISBLANK( First_Period_Listed__c ) , ISBLANK( Taxpay_Start_Date__c ) , ISBLANK( Date_Notice_Issued__c ) )&& NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c , 'Pending PAC Review - New Notice Received')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c , 'Pending PAC Review - Transferring New to D/E')) && RecordTypeId ='012700000001kI1' && NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Admin"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Taxpay Start Date,1st Period Listed Date Or Date Notice Issued cannot be NULL if Status is not Pending PAC Review - Transferring New to D/E.
